Package es.ull.iis.util

Provides miscellaneous utility classes, such as simulation cycle management (Cycle, CycleIterator...), complex data structures (PrioritizedMap), and other utilities (ClassPathHacker, RandomPermutation).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Prioritizable A prioritizable object has a priority and can be used in a Prioritized Table.
ThreadPool<T extends Runnable> A generic interface to create a pool of threads.
 

Class Summary
ClassPathHacker  
Cycle Defines a repeated sequence of events.
CycleIterator Allows to iterate over a cycle definition.
DiscreteCycleIterator Allows to iterate over a cycle definition.
ExcelTools  
ExtendedMath A simple class which provides classes to perform some mathematical operations.
Output Handles the debug messages of the simulator.
PeriodicCycle Defines a periodically repeated sequence of events.
PrioritizedMap<T extends Collection<E>,E extends Prioritizable> An structure which contains a priority-ordered map.
PrioritizedTable<E extends Prioritizable> An structure which contains a priority-ordered list.
RandomPermutation This class provides a method to generate permutations.
RoundedPeriodicCycle An special periodic cycle which rounds (or trunks) the incidence of events.
SingleThreadPool<T extends Runnable> A single threaded pool of threads.
StandardThreadPool<T extends Runnable> A standard pool of threads, consisting on 1 to N threads to execute tasks.
Statistics A simple package to get some basic statistics.
TableCycle Defines a set of timestamps when something happens.
WeeklyPeriodicCycle A week-based periodic cycle which allows a user to define events happening some days a week.
 

Enum Summary
RoundedPeriodicCycle.Type Different ways the incidence of events can be treated: ROUND: Events are going to be rounded. 1.1 is 1 and 1.6 is 2 CEIL: Events are going to be ceiled. 1.1 is 2 and 1.6 is 2 FLOOR: Events are going to be floored. 1.1 is 1 and 1.6 is 1
WeeklyPeriodicCycle.WeekDays  
 

Package es.ull.iis.util Description

Provides miscellaneous utility classes, such as simulation cycle management (Cycle, CycleIterator...), complex data structures (PrioritizedMap), and other utilities (ClassPathHacker, RandomPermutation).
